title: Perceptual Mapping and Multidimensional Scaling Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and data visualization concepts
context.additional_context: Training program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to strengthen practical data interpretation competencies

learning_goals: Learners will generate perceptual maps using Multidimensional Scaling (MDS) techniques with real-world data.
Learners will interpret the axis meanings of generated perceptual maps and apply them to strategic decision-making.
Learners will integrate perceptual map analysis results into simulated business scenarios in a VR environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
